metadata.title: USN-6139-1 -- Python vulnerability
metadata.description: Yebo Cao discovered that Python incorrectly handled certain URLs. An attacker could use this issue to bypass blockinglisting methods. This issue was first addressed in USN-5960-1, but was incomplete. Here we address an additional fix to that issue. (CVE-2023-24329)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-6139-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  python3.11-doc - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 python3.11 - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 python3.11-full - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 idle-python3.11 - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 libpython3.11-testsuite - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 libpython3.11-minimal - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 python3.11-examples - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 libpython3.11 - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 libpython3.11-stdlib - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 python3.11-nopie - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 python3.11-dev - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 libpython3.11-dev - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 python3.11-venv - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 python3.11-minimal - 3.11.2-6ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
